snippet.title: War Mongrels Reveal Trailer - Part I
snippet.description:
War Mongrels is an isometric real-time tactics game which takes place on the eastern front of World War II. Its story-driven campaign takes inspiration in the grim events that actually took place and the real stories that arose from them. Dive into the dark side of war on your own or in co-op.

http://www.warmongrels.com/

Add to Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1101790

Follow Destructive Creations: 
https://www.facebook.com/destructivecreationsteam/
https://twitter.com/DestCreat_Team
https://www.instagram.com/destructive_creationsofficial/
https://www.twitch.tv/destructive_creations
